INTENTIONAL TECHNOLOGY

Intentional Technology

Welcome

The aim of this course is to help you use technology intentionally.

We will work through a variety of real life scenarios and explore some small, simple changes that hopefully make a big difference to the way you use technology.

The course is made up of some  KEY IDEAS , some  ACTIVITIES and some GUIDANCE

The first activity is to introduce yourself to your fellow course participants.

 ACTIVITY: Introduce Yourself

The first activity, if you are comfortable doing so, is to introduce yourself to the other course participants.

In your message, please briefly describe your intention for the course. What is is you are hoping to learn about or to change?

This course is being created by Careful Digital. If you would like to find out more about our services, please Contact Us
